content.webTitle: Man suffers life-threatening injuries in south London shooting

fields.headline: Man suffers life-threatening injuries in south London shooting
fields.bodyText: A man has been taken to hospital with life-threatening injuries following a shooting in Clapham, south London. Police were called to the incident on Clapham High Street, near the junction with Cato Road, at about 9.40pm on Wednesday night. A Metropolitan police spokesman said the victim, in his 20s, had been taken to a hospital in south London. He said: "The shooting was non-fatal but his injuries were described as life threatening."
